segments.text: Sis , why did you ask me to come to this bargain market ? It's so crowded , and you can't find anything that you really want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You just don't get it . Looking for bargains can be really interesting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you serious ? How can that be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bargaining is a game , or even a battle . You feel like a winner when you get a good price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . You know , you can never really win . The salesperson never loses . They make their living out of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . But I just love it . Come here !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , this silk carpet is really beautiful . Look at the pattern , and how delicate it is !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You do have great taste . That's the most expensive stuff here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Oh , this one . I like the cloisonn vase .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding me ? I bought a same one last week . It's surprising that there is something we both like . Well , what do you think of these ceramic cups ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . They look so cheap . Something else , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about this picture ? I think Benjamin would like it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't underestimate his taste . I don't think he'd like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be so sure . He loves the vase I bought here last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . Well , anyway , it's up to you . But I can tell that you come here often .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely . That's why I can always get a good price .
segments.speaker: S2
